Coh3 feedbacks :  It is a nope. A hard nope. We lost all the games with bridges, I remember in coh1 and 2 a lot of long games, enjoyable games with flank on a side to fight for a bridge you could destroy and rebuild, it doesnt exist in coh3. About "doctrines" you have now few choices (like 3 by default per faction, for Uk Usa germans and afrikacorp) with now 2 branches to choose... Ending with a really lake of diversity on that.  You sapers don't build any base anymore. You got a lot off map calls. You focus on your troops more (it is not bad by default, I am not against something new), so you have time to micro more your units and... this is where the desaster strike. Coh3 is fully imballanced (took 8 years to barely ballance coh2), Salieri are more than insane but not only, some cheap units are too powerfull for what they cost and....   I saw a player in a 4v4 (american troops) mooving really all his troops in a huge pack, no moovement individually, really mass center and this is it. 1 mg and some sapers in ultra kill mode able to not sustain mass injuries running to my tank and infantry and mortars shooting them : used a wtf explosiv to wipe out my tank 1 shot, and do the same on salieri unit, and this is it, it was over. The us sapers had many things shooting them, no way. This mean that : All the relations between beeing suppressed, injuries, moral (that don't exist actually) loss of troops is totally broken.  Compare to coh2 it is not necesserly the tank win button (which is good). This looks like more COH1 about it (which is good). You have now 4 differents gameplays. Indeed each faction, British, U.S, Germans and Afrikacorp are totally different about producing units, evolving them etc... This could be a great idea but some factions have a huge adventage compare to the others, making early game painfull for some, and super easy for the others. It "reverse" mid to long game.   Games are boring.  I complained once in a game about ballancing and started to team up with one of my opponent, a nice cool guy who showed me with germans, a super canon you can deploy extreemly fast with a truck (this is a cool feateure, the trucks moove tings now) an AT unit, I saw this super AT destroying everything, he mooved it back in a split of a second and typed : This is imba. Indeed, it was completly imballanced.  So conclusion : I feel an overall game slow, your units take time to arrive, you have few of them. Always the same maps, really few maps. No bridges, no real tactic. Total desapointment. No winter map at all (ok it is Italy campain but... North of Italy you got : the Alps...)  I recommand to buy it really cheap with special promo only. The cash shop is a joke (bcse every games need a cash shop now). I remember when Sega took over coh2 and Relic, the campfire in snow, your units slowned by blizzars, everything who was unique and new and GREAT and PERFECT was taking down when Sega arrived. I heard (not sure) that Sega is not involved in coh3 anymore, so please Relic, Build back the great games we had. Coh3 is a shame.  Context :  I was a huge fan of coh1 and coh2 (well more coh1 actually). And I waited long before testing Coh3 and really waited before posting. I play multiplayer only, tested the campain of coh3 and I didn't like it at all, I felt like a never ending tutorial explaining you everything you have to do (to be sure you understand how the "war game mode" of the campain works, it is too much)

Coh3 feedbacks :  It is a nope. A hard nope. We lost all the games with bridges, I remember in coh1 and 2 a lot of long games, enjoyable games with flank on a side to fight for a bridge you could destroy and rebuild, it doesnt exist in coh3. About "doctrines" you have now few choices (like 3 by default per faction, for Uk Usa germans and afrikacorp) with now 2 branches to choose... Ending with a really lake of diversity on that.  You sapers don't build any base anymore. You got a lot off map calls. You focus on your troops more (it is not bad by default, I am not against something new), so you have time to micro more your units and... this is where the desaster strike. Coh3 is fully imballanced (took 8 years to barely ballance coh2), Salieri are more than insane but not only, some cheap units are too powerfull for what they cost and....   I saw a player in a 4v4 (american troops) mooving really all his troops in a huge pack, no moovement individually, really mass center and this is it. 1 mg and some sapers in ultra kill mode able to not sustain mass injuries running to my tank and infantry and mortars shooting them : used a wtf explosiv to wipe out my tank 1 shot, and do the same on salieri unit, and this is it, it was over. The us sapers had many things shooting them, no way. This mean that : All the relations between beeing suppressed, injuries, moral (that don't exist actually) loss of troops is totally broken.  Compare to coh2 it is not necesserly the tank win button (which is good). This looks like more COH1 about it (which is good). You have now 4 differents gameplays. Indeed each faction, British, U.S, Germans and Afrikacorp are totally different about producing units, evolving them etc... This could be a great idea but some factions have a huge adventage compare to the others, making early game painfull for some, and super easy for the others. It "reverse" mid to long game.   Games are boring.  I complained once in a game about ballancing and started to team up with one of my opponent, a nice cool guy who showed me with germans, a super canon you can deploy extreemly fast with a truck (this is a cool feateure, the trucks moove tings now) an AT unit, I saw this super AT destroying everything, he mooved it back in a split of a second and typed : This is imba. Indeed, it was completly imballanced.  So conclusion : I feel an overall game slow, your units take time to arrive, you have few of them. Always the same maps, really few maps. No bridges, no real tactic. Total desapointment. No winter map at all (ok it is Italy campain but... North of Italy you got : the Alps...)  I recommand to buy it really cheap with special promo only. The cash shop is a joke (bcse every games need a cash shop now). I remember when Sega took over coh2 and Relic, the campfire in snow, your units slowned by blizzars, everything who was unique and new and GREAT and PERFECT was taking down when Sega arrived. I heard (not sure) that Sega is not involved in coh3 anymore, so please Relic, Build back the great games we had. Coh3 is a shame.  Context :  I was a huge fan of coh1 and coh2 (well more coh1 actually). And I waited long before testing Coh3 and really waited before posting. I play multiplayer only, tested the campain of coh3 and I didn't like it at all, I felt like a never ending tutorial explaining you everything you have to do (to be sure you understand how the "war game mode" of the campain works, it is too much)

I heard (not sure) that Sega is not involved in coh3 anymore, so please Relic, Build back the great games we had. Coh3 feedbacks :  It is a nope. A hard nope. We lost all the games with bridges, I remember in coh1 and 2 a lot of long games, enjoyable games with flank on a side to fight for a bridge you could destroy and rebuild, it doesnt exist in coh3. About "doctrines" you have now few choices (like 3 by default per faction, for Uk Usa germans and afrikacorp) with now 2 branches to choose... Ending with a really lake of diversity on that.  You sapers don't build any base anymore. You got a lot off map calls. You focus on your troops more (it is not bad by default, I am not against something new), so you have time to micro more your units and... this is where the desaster strike. Coh3 is fully imballanced (took 8 years to barely ballance coh2), Salieri are more than insane but not only, some cheap units are too powerfull for what they cost and....   I saw a player in a 4v4 (american troops) mooving really all his troops in a huge pack, no moovement individually, really mass center and this is it. 1 mg and some sapers in ultra kill mode able to not sustain mass injuries running to my tank and infantry and mortars shooting them : used a wtf explosiv to wipe out my tank 1 shot, and do the same on salieri unit, and this is it, it was over. The us sapers had many things shooting them, no way. This mean that : All the relations between beeing suppressed, injuries, moral (that don't exist actually) loss of troops is totally broken.  Compare to coh2 it is not necesserly the tank win button (which is good). This looks like more COH1 about it (which is good). You have now 4 differents gameplays. Indeed each faction, British, U.S, Germans and Afrikacorp are totally different about producing units, evolving them etc... This could be a great idea but some factions have a huge adventage compare to the others, making early game painfull for some, and super easy for the others. It "reverse" mid to long game.   Games are boring.  I complained once in a game about ballancing and started to team up with one of my opponent, a nice cool guy who showed me with germans, a super canon you can deploy extreemly fast with a truck (this is a cool feateure, the trucks moove tings now) an AT unit, I saw this super AT destroying everything, he mooved it back in a split of a second and typed : This is imba. Indeed, it was completly imballanced.  So conclusion : I feel an overall game slow, your units take time to arrive, you have few of them. Always the same maps, really few maps. No bridges, no real tactic. Total desapointment. No winter map at all (ok it is Italy campain but... North of Italy you got : the Alps...)  I recommand to buy it really cheap with special promo only. The cash shop is a joke (bcse every games need a cash shop now). I remember when Sega took over coh2 and Relic, the campfire in snow, your units slowned by blizzars, everything who was unique and new and GREAT and PERFECT was taking down when Sega arrived. I heard (not sure) that Sega is not involved in coh3 anymore, so please Relic, Build back the great games we had. Coh3 is a shame.  Context :  I was a huge fan of coh1 and coh2 (well more coh1 actually). And I waited long before testing Coh3 and really waited before posting. I play multiplayer only, tested the campain of coh3 and I didn't like it at all, I felt like a never ending tutorial explaining you everything you have to do (to be sure you understand how the "war game mode" of the campain works, it is too much)

Coh3 feedbacks :  It is a nope. A hard nope. We lost all the games with bridges, I remember in coh1 and 2 a lot of long games, enjoyable games with flank on a side to fight for a bridge you could destroy and rebuild, it doesnt exist in coh3. About "doctrines" you have now few choices (like 3 by default per faction, for Uk Usa germans and afrikacorp) with now 2 branches to choose... Ending with a really lake of diversity on that.  You sapers don't build any base anymore. You got a lot off map calls. You focus on your troops more (it is not bad by default, I am not against something new), so you have time to micro more your units and... this is where the desaster strike. Coh3 is fully imballanced (took 8 years to barely ballance coh2), Salieri are more than insane but not only, some cheap units are too powerfull for what they cost and....   I saw a player in a 4v4 (american troops) mooving really all his troops in a huge pack, no moovement individually, really mass center and this is it. 1 mg and some sapers in ultra kill mode able to not sustain mass injuries running to my tank and infantry and mortars shooting them : used a wtf explosiv to wipe out my tank 1 shot, and do the same on salieri unit, and this is it, it was over. The us sapers had many things shooting them, no way. This mean that : All the relations between beeing suppressed, injuries, moral (that don't exist actually) loss of troops is totally broken.  Compare to coh2 it is not necesserly the tank win button (which is good). This looks like more COH1 about it (which is good). You have now 4 differents gameplays. Indeed each faction, British, U.S, Germans and Afrikacorp are totally different about producing units, evolving them etc... This could be a great idea but some factions have a huge adventage compare to the others, making early game painfull for some, and super easy for the others. It "reverse" mid to long game.   Games are boring.  I complained once in a game about ballancing and started to team up with one of my opponent, a nice cool guy who showed me with germans, a super canon you can deploy extreemly fast with a truck (this is a cool feateure, the trucks moove tings now) an AT unit, I saw this super AT destroying everything, he mooved it back in a split of a second and typed : This is imba. Indeed, it was completly imballanced.  So conclusion : I feel an overall game slow, your units take time to arrive, you have few of them. Always the same maps, really few maps. No bridges, no real tactic. Total desapointment. No winter map at all (ok it is Italy campain but... North of Italy you got : the Alps...)  I recommand to buy it really cheap with special promo only. The cash shop is a joke (bcse every games need a cash shop now). I remember when Sega took over coh2 and Relic, the campfire in snow, your units slowned by blizzars, everything who was unique and new and GREAT and PERFECT was taking down when Sega arrived. I heard (not sure) that Sega is not involved in coh3 anymore, so please Relic, Build back the great games we had. Coh3 is a shame.  Context :  I was a huge fan of coh1 and coh2 (well more coh1 actually). And I waited long before testing Coh3 and really waited before posting. I play multiplayer only, tested the campain of coh3 and I didn't like it at all, I felt like a never ending tutorial explaining you everything you have to do (to be sure you understand how the "war game mode" of the campain works, it is too much)

Coh3 feedbacks :  It is a nope. A hard nope. We lost all the games with bridges, I remember in coh1 and 2 a lot of long games, enjoyable games with flank on a side to fight for a bridge you could destroy and rebuild, it doesnt exist in coh3. About "doctrines" you have now few choices (like 3 by default per faction, for Uk Usa germans and afrikacorp) with now 2 branches to choose... Ending with a really lake of diversity on that.  You sapers don't build any base anymore. You got a lot off map calls. You focus on your troops more (it is not bad by default, I am not against something new), so you have time to micro more your units and... this is where the desaster strike. Coh3 is fully imballanced (took 8 years to barely ballance coh2), Salieri are more than insane but not only, some cheap units are too powerfull for what they cost and....   I saw a player in a 4v4 (american troops) mooving really all his troops in a huge pack, no moovement individually, really mass center and this is it. 1 mg and some sapers in ultra kill mode able to not sustain mass injuries running to my tank and infantry and mortars shooting them : used a wtf explosiv to wipe out my tank 1 shot, and do the same on salieri unit, and this is it, it was over. The us sapers had many things shooting them, no way. This mean that : All the relations between beeing suppressed, injuries, moral (that don't exist actually) loss of troops is totally broken.  Compare to coh2 it is not necesserly the tank win button (which is good). This looks like more COH1 about it (which is good). You have now 4 differents gameplays. Indeed each faction, British, U.S, Germans and Afrikacorp are totally different about producing units, evolving them etc... This could be a great idea but some factions have a huge adventage compare to the others, making early game painfull for some, and super easy for the others. It "reverse" mid to long game.   Games are boring.  I complained once in a game about ballancing and started to team up with one of my opponent, a nice cool guy who showed me with germans, a super canon you can deploy extreemly fast with a truck (this is a cool feateure, the trucks moove tings now) an AT unit, I saw this super AT destroying everything, he mooved it back in a split of a second and typed : This is imba. Indeed, it was completly imballanced.  So conclusion : I feel an overall game slow, your units take time to arrive, you have few of them. Always the same maps, really few maps.
